metadata.title: Ouvrez donc les yeux!.
metadata.creator: Duprat, Pierre-Antoine, comte.
Duprat, Pierre-Antoine, comte
Duprat, Pierre-Antoine, comte. Le comte Duprat devenu théologien
Agoult, M. d' (Charles-Constance-César-Loup-Joseph-Mathieu), 1747-1824
Biron, Armand-Louis de Gontaut, duc de, 1747-1793
Favras, Thomas de Mahy, marquis de, 1744-1790
metadata.description: Authorship claimed by Duprat in his Le comte Duprat devenu théologien
Date of publication based on another edition. Cf. Barbier, A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, III, 756

Barbier identifies d'Agoult as the author of this work and Biron and Favras as the supposed authors at the time of publication. Martin & Walter attribute it variously to d'Agoult and Duprat. Cf. Barbier, A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, III, 756; Martin & Walter. Révolution française, I, 64; II, 12293
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, I, 64; II, 12293
